thread.title: Daimler is recalling 1 million Mercedes vehicles at risk of causing a fire
thread.title_full: Daimler is recalling 1 million Mercedes vehicles at risk of causing a fire - Business Insider

author: Bernie Woodall, Reuters
title: Daimler is recalling 1 million Mercedes vehicles at risk of causing a fire
text:
A Mercedes GLC. Hollis Johnson
Daimler says it's recalling 1 million newer-model Mercedes-Benz vehicles worldwide due to the risk of fire, after 51 fires were reported.
The German company said that no injuries or deaths have been reported to them regarding the vehicles it will begin recalling in the U.S. market in July when parts are available.
Affected models include C-Class, E-Class and CLA cars and GLA and GLC SUVs, all from 2015 through 2017, Fox News reported.
(Reporting by Bernie Woodall; Editing by Chizu Nomiyama; Danielle Muoio contributed to this report)
